feed.title: MechPy Docs
feed.subtitle: MechPy: Empowering Engineers with a Comprehensive Toolbox for Continuum Mechanics and Finite Element Method (FEM) Analysis.

entry.title: Introducing MechPy Docs!
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first post in the MechPy Docs! This blog is dedicated to sharing insights, tutorials, and updates related to mechanical engineering concepts and their applications in Python programming.
In the _posts directory of our Jekyll site, you will find our blog posts. To add new content, we simply create a file in this directory with the format YYYY-MM-DD-title-of-post.md and include th...
